title: Episode 26: Grit
description: Grit is a quality that parents strive to teach to their children, and teachers strive to teach their students. This week on Hidden Brain, we explore grit, and ask, does it also have a downside?
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
